-1.title: Pilot
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Four friends in their mid-twenties rally around one of them, victim of a "pull a pig prank". Meanwhile, their friend's divorced mother, is experiencing a similar situation in her search for companionship, which will lead to some hilarious confusion as well as dramatic moments. This will inspire the group to reach out to the web community using various media to discuss and exchange advice about relation-ships, sexual intercourse, dynamics with the other or the same sex. The media interaction is for real and at the end of every episode they will post a question connected to the following episode subject, that will appear in real time on the InterPlay media accounts. In this way the viewers will have the opportunity of interacting with the authors, suggesting topics as well as addressing some of the characters actions and dynamics. InterPlay, the true interactive Web series, where the viewer plays an active part.
imdb.title: Interplay
plot: Online dating 3.0. From cruel pranks to social cohesion, online dating as the main source of relating for young adults. ...and not only. But is it really all a game?

Four friends in their mid-twenties rally around one of them, victim of a "pull a pig prank". Meanwhile, their friend's divorced mother, is experiencing a similar situation in her search for companionship, which will lead to some hilarious confusion as well as dramatic moments. This will inspire the group to reach out to the web community using various media to discuss and exchange advice about relation-ships, sexual intercourse, dynamics with the other or the same sex. The media interaction is for real and at the end of every episode they will post a question connected to the following episode subject, that will appear in real time on the InterPlay media accounts. In this way the viewers will have the opportunity of interacting with the authors, suggesting topics as well as addressing some of the characters actions and dynamics. InterPlay, the true interactive Web series, where the viewer plays an active part.::Flaminia Graziadei
